attributes.action: introduce the teaching of sign language in all schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would be in keeping with current legislation concerning discrimination against persons with disabilities, in that it would give a new generation the relevant means of communication with a largely discriminated against section of the community. As noise from electronic gadgets such as portable MP3 players etc has the potential to damage the hearing, we may well find in the future that more and more people would benefit from a knowlege of signing.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/deafequality/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
